caption: A little slice of Heaven.  One of the best greasy spoons in the area.  The food is well worth the wait.  My family has used this food truck for everything from dinner to catering for birthday parties. The truck is run by good people that make even better food.
Didn’t mean to click the rating. Don’t know how to undo. Didn’t go to this place

Authentic Mexican food truck, with menu items prepair Ed right in front of you. You might have to wait a bit for meat to be grilled, so expect to wait 3-5 minutes before your burrito comes out. But when it's ready - it will be delicious!
